section.title: InflectedFormCaption object type
section.para: An InflectedFormCaption represents one of several allowed values for the caption property of InflectedForm objects.

example.title: Example: restricting the captions of inflected forms
example.programlisting: LexicographicResource: language="ga", displayLanguage="en" PartOfSpeechCaption: value="nf", displayValue="feminine noun" InflectedFormCaption: value="gs", displayValue="genitive singular" InflectedFormCaption: value="pl", displayValue="plural" Entry headword="deirfiúr" PartOfSpeech: value="nf" InflectedForm: caption="gs", value="deirféar" InflectedForm: caption="pl", value="deirfiúracha"

example.title: Example: mapping the captions of inflected forms to external inventories
example.programlisting: InflectedFormCaption: value="gs", displayValue="genitive singular" Mapping: sameAs="http://www.lexinfo.net/ontology/3.0/lexinfo#singular" Mapping: sameAs= "http://www.lexinfo.net/ontology/3.0/lexinfo#genitiveCase" InflectedFormCaption: value="pl", displayValue="plural" Mapping: sameAs="http://www.lexinfo.net/ontology/3.0/lexinfo#plural"
